member.name: T:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector
member.summary: Related RoleParticipants Selector

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.ProgrammablySelectTargetParticipantByParticipantKEY(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Performs a selection of a particular Target Participant programmatically
Triggers OnRoleParticipant_Selected Event on Success

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.DataBind
member.summary:
Invoke this function to populate the UserControl with a list of retrieved RoleParticipants
Pre-requisites: 1) AppliedRelationshipType must be specified 2) ReferenceRoleParticipantKEY must be specified (with the correct settings for RoleOfReferenceRoleParticipant) 3) TargetReferenceSiteKEY must be specified (if FilterByReferenceSite == true (default))

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.ClearAll
member.summary: Invoke this function to programmably clear all the items in the DropDownList

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.GetSpecifiedReferenceRoleParticipant
member.summary:
Gets the Specified RoleParticipant object
Returns Null if RelationshipType is invalid or not specified or ReferenceRoleParticipantKEY is not Specified

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.GetSpecifiedReferenceRoleParticipant_PartyDetails
member.summary:
Gets the underlying Party Object for the ReferenceRoleParticipant
The Party Object may be cast into Company or Personnel Object for full Party-Details depending on its PartyType property
Returns Null if RelationshipType is invalid or not specified or ReferenceRoleParticipantKEY is not Specified

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.GetSelectedTargetRoleParticipant_PartyDetails
member.summary:
Gets the underlying Party Object for the selected TargetRoleParticipant
The Party Object may be cast into Company or Personnel Object for full Party-Details depending on its PartyType property
Returns Null if no Participants is currently selected

member.summary:
Gets the RoleType Object of the Target Participants

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.SelectedTargetRoleParticipant
member.summary:
Gets the selected TargetRoleParticipant Object

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.AppliedRelationshipType
member.summary:
The Relationship Type that links the Reference Participant and Target Participants
This property must be specified before performing Databind()

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.RoleOfReferenceRoleParticipant
member.summary:
Specify the Role that the Reference Participant is playing
DEFAULT: RoleA

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.ReferenceRoleParticipantKEY
member.summary:
Specify the Reference Participant
This property must be specified before performing Databind()

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.ExcludeDeactivatedParticipants
member.summary:
Specify whether to exclude Deactivated Participants
Default: True

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.FilterByReferenceSite
member.summary:
Specifiy whether Target Role-Participants who are not referenced by the TargetSite will be excluded.
Default: False (Unlike the case of Independent RoleParticipant Selector, this property is set to False by default to reduce complexity and confusion during Records Retrieval)

member.name: P:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.User_Controls.RRPSelector.TargetReferenceSiteKEY
member.summary:
Specify the Target Reference Site for filtering RoleParticipants
This is ignored if the property "FilterByReferenceSite" == false

member.summary:
Allow over-writing of default instruction for selecting RoleParticipants
This is optional

Specify whether to exclude deactivated Participants Related Participant is considered deactivated if any of the below is true 1) Relationship validity period is inactive 2) Role-Participation Validity Period of either the Referenced or Target Participant is inactive 3) The Party (Company/Personnel) record of the Referenced or Target Participant is Deactivated

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.PartyRelationshipType.GetRelatedRoleParticipants_FilterByRefSite(System.Int32,FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.PTY_MGT.BusinessLayer.PartyRelationshipType.RoleOfRefParticipant,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Select all RoleParticipants that are related to a reference RoleParticipant via this RelationshipType
member.param: ParticipantKEY of the referenced participants
Specify the role played by the Reference Participant

Specify whether to exclude deactivated Participants Related Participant is considered deactivated if any of the below is true 1) Relationship validity period is inactive 2) Role-Participation Validity Period of either the Referenced or Target Participant is inactive 3) The Party (Company/Personnel) record of the Referenced or Target Participant is Deactivated
Role-Participants who are not referenced by the TargetSites will be excluded.
